cause.description:
This cause is going to collect donations and send them to the Presidential candidate that runs on the Universal and National Healthcare ticket. This cause will also provide information and a forum in which people can discuss the benefits of National Healthcare and also spread the word on why we as a society need to embrace this system of equality and fairness. This cause is open for all to all people wishing to make a difference in this Country and for all people that believe in equality, and the right to live for all citizens in the United States.
1. Universal Healthcare is an absolute necessity for the United States
2. Everyone in the United States should be able to recieve healthcare and have the treatment paid for by the Federal Government
3. We will not stop unitl this system is established in the United States
cause.mission: Endorse whichever Presidental candiate runs on Free Universal and National Healthcare.
cause.name: Universal/National Healthcare
